metadata.title: RHSA-2009:0411 -- device-mapper-multipath security update (Moderate)
metadata.description: Updated device-mapper-multipath packages that fix a security issue are now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 4 and 5. This update has been rated as having moderate security impact by the Red Hat Security Response Team. The device-mapper multipath packages provide tools to manage multipath devices by issuing instructions to the device-mapper multipath kernel module, and by managing the creation and removal of partitions for device-mapper devices.
